title.rendered: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2022 | 1 Device | 1 Year | PC | Online Code

content.rendered:
With so much of your life stored on your PC, you need to do all you can to protect it. Kaspersky Anti-Virus gives you a smarter way to protect everything on your computer. It helps you guard against viruses, Trojans, ransomware and other infections. And because it combines security and efficiency, you get award-winning protection that won’t slow you down.

System Requirements:
Item model number ‏ : ‎ KL1171ADAFS-1811UAO
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 11, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Kaspersky
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B076CXSG7F

BLOCKS DANGEROUS THREATS: Enjoy essential PC protection against malware like viruses, phishing, ransomware and more.
MAINTAINS TOP SPEEDS: Get the most out of your computer while Kaspersky runs quietly in the background.
SIMPLIFIES YOUR SECURITY: Easily manage your protection online—anytime and any location.
BEATS NEW ATTACKS: Get real-time updates with cloud-assisted security.
